themes.scientific_basis: Based on research into long-term desire and Esther Perel's work on erotic intelligence.
themes.description: This theme encourages couples to explore what initially sparked their passion, rediscovering elements of mystery, novelty, and attraction in their relationship.

themes.scientific_basis: Inspired by relationship rituals research, highlighting the importance of intentional quality time.
themes.description: This theme guides couples in planning creative and exciting date nights, bringing back the thrill and connection from their early days together.

themes.scientific_basis: Drawn from studies on playfulness and its role in enhancing relationship satisfaction.
themes.description: This theme introduces playful and lighthearted activities to bring spontaneity and joy into the relationship, reigniting passion through shared fun.

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in sensory-focused intimacy exercises from sexual health research.
themes.description: This theme helps couples explore new ways to connect physically and emotionally through touch, scent, and other senses, fostering renewed passion.

themes.scientific_basis: Based on novelty and arousal theories, emphasizing the importance of new experiences in rekindling excitement.
themes.description: This theme encourages couples to break out of their daily routines by trying new activities together, creating shared adventures that spark fresh excitement.

themes.scientific_basis: Inspired by research on affection and its impact on relationship quality.
themes.description: This theme encourages couples to express their love through thoughtful, creative gestures that remind their partner of how much they are cherished.

themes.scientific_basis: Grounded in research on the role of fantasy in maintaining passion and excitement.
themes.description: This theme invites couples to share and explore fantasies together, blending imagination with reality to reignite intimacy and connection.

themes.scientific_basis: Based on spontaneity research and its effect on relationship excitement.
themes.description: This theme helps couples embrace spontaneous actions and decisions, bringing unpredictability and excitement back into their relationship.

themes.scientific_basis: Drawn from gratitude research, focusing on its ability to enhance affection and connection.
themes.description: This theme encourages couples to amplify expressions of gratitude and admiration, reigniting emotional closeness and passion through genuine appreciation.

themes.scientific_basis: Inspired by theories of delayed gratification and its role in increasing desire.
themes.description: This theme introduces practices that build anticipation, such as planning surprises or teasing moments, to rekindle excitement and desire in the relationship.
